errors_pas_access_denied: Access to the restricted function has been denied by the system.
errors_pas_database_error: The application encountered an database communication error and is unable complete the current task.
errors_pas_required_object_not_found: The application was unable to load a required component.
errors_pas_tasks_daemon_not_available: The background service application is currently not available.
errors_pas_tid_invalid: The specified task ID is invalid.
errors_pas_unknown_error: The application encountered an unknown error and is unable complete the current task.
errors_pas_unsupported_command: The application has been accessed using an unknown command.
